messages.content: As an AI assistant, my role is to meticulously analyze criminal justice documents and extract information about law enforcement personnel. The response will contain: 1) The name of a law enforcement personnel. The individual's name must be prefixed with one of the following titles to be in law enforcement: Detective, Sergeant, Lieutenant, Captain, Deputy, Officer, Patrol Officer, Criminalist, Technician, Coroner, or Dr. Please prefix the name with 'Officer Name: '. I will derive this data from the following paragraph: 'During the early hours of Tuesday, Detective Reynolds reported to the scene where Officer Grant and Officer Marquez had already cordoned off the area. Sergeant Williams was coordinating with the SWAT team. Meanwhile, Lieutenant Parker was briefing the media about the situation. As the situation intensified, Captain Rodriguez arrived to take command. In the lab, Criminalist Jensen was analyzing the evidence, while Technician Sophia was busy with the surveillance footage. Dr. Norton, the forensic pathologist, was waiting for the body to arrive for a post-mortem examination.'
Identify each individual in the transcript, by name, who are directly referred to as officers, sergeants, lieutenants, captains, detectives, homicide officers, and crime lab personnel.
